Aliexpress Bot - Your Ultimate Aliexpress Assistant

Aliexpress Bot is a powerful Chrome Extension designed to automate your daily interactions with Aliexpress. Whether you're a frequent shopper or someone who loves to collect coins and maximize savings, this extension has you covered. Open-source and continuously evolving, Aliexpress Bot simplifies your online experience by automating routine tasks, helping you find the best deals, and boosting your savings without the need for manual input.

This tool automatically handles your daily tasks, ensuring you never miss a day of collecting coins or completing essential activities that help you save on Aliexpress. With planned features to inject coupon codes directly onto product pages and even play Aliexpress games for you, this bot makes shopping effortless and fun.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Features:
- Automatic Coin Collection
Automatically collects Aliexpress coins every 24 hours, ensuring you never miss out on daily rewards.

- Automatic Login
No need to worry about getting logged outâ€”Aliexpress Bot automatically logs you back in if you're disconnected, so you stay on track with your tasks.

- Daily Task Automation
The bot automatically completes daily tasks, helping you accumulate rewards and benefits without manual effort.

- Open-Source on GitHub
Explore the code, contribute, or customize the extension according to your needs. Full transparency and community-driven development.

- Planned: Coupon Code Injection
In future updates, Aliexpress Bot will find the best coupon codes and deals for various products and inject them directly onto the product page, so you always get the best price.

- Planned: Game Automation
Soon, the bot will be able to automatically play Aliexpress games, helping you earn extra rewards and coins with minimal effort.

With Aliexpress Bot, saving money and time on Aliexpress has never been easier. Install now and let the bot handle the hard work for you!
